lazarus_implementation_tools.external_apis package

Submodules

lazarus_implementation_tools.external_apis.consensus_apis module

lazarus_implementation_tools.external_apis.consensus_apis.get_npi_registry(npi: str) → Any[source]

Ping the NPI Registry to get information for a given NPI number.

Parameters:

npi – The NPI number to query.

Returns:

A dictionary containing the response from the NPI Registry.

lazarus_implementation_tools.external_apis.consensus_apis.ping_gmaps(address: str = None, city: str = None, state: str = None) → Any[source]

Ping Google Maps API to validate address information.

Parameters:

  • address – The address for which to fetch information.

  • city – The city where the address is located.

  • state – The state where the address is located.

Returns:

A tuple containing the main address, city, and state.

lazarus_implementation_tools.external_apis.consensus_apis.send_smarty_request(address: str = None, city: str = None, state: str = None, zip: str = None) → Any[source]

Ping the Smarty API to validate address information.

Parameters:

  • address – The street address.

  • city – The city name.

  • state – The state abbreviation.

  • zip – The ZIP code.

Returns:

The closest matching address to the information given in the input determined by the Smarty API, or None if inputs are insufficient.

Raises:

Exception – If there are errors in the response or if the response is empty.

  • city – The city where the address is located.

  • state – The state where the address is located.

lazarus_implementation_tools.external_apis.utils.validate_address_using_smarty(address: str = None, city: str = None, state: str = None, zip: str = None) → Any[source]

Ping the Smarty API to validate address information.

Parameters:

  • address – The street address.

  • city – The city name.

  • state – The state abbreviation.

  • zip – The ZIP code.

Returns:

The closest matching address to the information given in the input determined by the Smarty API, or None if inputs are insufficient.

Raises:

Exception – If there are errors in the response or if the response is empty.
